name: Fest.io
description:
Exciting UFO wars for the ultimate control over the map. Who will be the last UFO standing?

Your goal is to become the biggest UFO on the map and be crowned as king. Eat everything and fear no one in your way!

For the ultimate UFO war, play in Battle Mode. Your mission is to kill as many UFO's as possible in 90 seconds. Can you do it?

Main features:
- Three modes for play: Classic, Solo and Battle
- Daily rewards
- The Magical Wheel Spin
- POWER UPS!

How to play?
- Move your finger across the screen to move your UFO
- Follow the arrows of other players on the edge of your screen and chase them!
- Get all the magnet power-ups on the map to become the biggest UFO!
publishers: CUBE GAMES YAZILIM SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
